# ion-card-title

`ion-card-title` is a child component of `ion-card`


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### color

string

The color to use for the text color.


#### mode

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.

The color to use for the text color.

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.
